description:
The current integration of nova with the v2 quantum api does not support the extension that allows a tenant to pass in a specific set of networks to use.  

This was supported by the old quantum manager, and should be really easy to add back (just a few lines of actual code, plus tests, which should also exist in the old quantum manager).

See old code at: 

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/network/quantum/manager.py#L335
title: add support for requested_networks extension to Nova/Quantum v2 code
